extendedInfo.description: Ticket to RideÂ® for Android is a cross-country train adventure playable online, in which you will collect and play train cards to claim railway routes connecting cities listed on Destination Tickets you will receive at the start of each game. The longer your routes, the more points you'll earn. But be careful not to find yourself blocked off by your opponents, as each Destination ticket not fulfilled will cost you dearly! With over 35 million games played; a new game starting every 13 seconds, 24 hours a day, 365 days a year; and an active community of over 100,000 players from Sydney to Berlin, Paris to Seoul, and Los Angeles to New Delhi, Ticket to Ride for Android is the fast and friendly way to enjoy this classic, award-winning board game. It's not just exciting - it's addictive!Ticket to Ride for Android will run on tablets with a minimum screen size of 1024Ã600 (1280Ã800 or higher recommended), using Android version 4.0.3 or higher with 1GB of RAM.

reviews.title: Great board game conversion
reviews.comment: Edit - I have downgraded my score because this literally spanks your battery. An hour of gaming and I have 32% left after full recharge, how is this even possible, add these are local games not even multiplayer. I wish it would save you score.  Would love to see play and pass and blue tooth implemented for local multilayer gaming. Apart from that you also have to keep playing for more maps so if you want all maps is going to cost you near \302\24317 for the complete collection which is quite s lot of money imop!
reviews.author: Rufus Glyn

reviews.title: Just like Steam version
reviews.comment: Haven\'t tried online multiplayer yet, but the single player experience is identical to the Steam version for Windows/OSX. Actually loads quicker on my N10 than my Core 2 based HTPC.  Edit: Deducted one star due to the hall of fame list resetting whenever the app is closed. Doesn\'t affect gameplay, but there\'s really no excuse for that sort of bug in an app this expensive.
reviews.author: Robert Scullion

reviews.title: Great game but sketchy battery use
reviews.comment: The game play is great but the battery use needs to be improved.  I played on my Galaxy tab 2 7\" for about 15 minutes while it was plugged in and charging.  When I started the battery was at about 25% and when I finished it was down to 20%.   Can\'t imagine what the battery use is if it isn\'t plugged in.    The game play matchs that of the Ipad and is quite smooth but would like a pass to play feature and the ability to login as different Games of Wonder users would be nice to have separate rankings.  If the battery issue is fixed I would probably give it a 4.  Battery is better here are the 4 stars...
reviews.author: Dylan Corkill

reviews.title: Not even close to ios version
reviews.comment: I bought the game because a friend had it for ios. Sad to see it is missing key feature. I can\'t believe it doesn\'t have pass and play or local lan options. I also don\'t see achievements like ios has. Need to add these items before I would recommend :-(
reviews.author: Mike Gamble

reviews.title: At last it\'s on the Android
reviews.comment: Pretty happy to finally have it available on the Android. Would like to have pass-and-play sometime in the future, but I probably would invest in the physical board game for that. As a quick 10 minute fix, I\'m good with this implementation.
reviews.author: Saul Simon Tan

reviews.title: Love this game.
reviews.comment: Glad I can now play on the go. Wish the app had achievements like the Iphone version does. If this feature is added, I would upgrade the rating to 5 stars.
reviews.author: Lisa Sanders

reviews.title: Multi between android good enough
reviews.comment: I wanted to be able to play my friends. Had to dig through the menu a bit, and couldn\'t find it at first, but now it\'s going and I\'m happy.
reviews.author: Robert Laitinen

reviews.title: Can\342\200\230t start the game
reviews.comment: I am using Lenovo model S6000-F. After installing, I can open the apps smoothly. However, when I start the game, it sticks on loading the map and nothing comes out. Please fix the bug.
reviews.author: Winson Leung

reviews.title: Too many bugs for $6.99
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t keep track of high scores. Won\'t let me play on certain titles because it thinks they are filled when they are not. Too many bugs.
reviews.author: Peter Mitchell

reviews.title: Great game but no local multiplayer!!
reviews.comment: Got it to play with others who have this app on ios but ticket to ride does not have local or pass okay mode! Please fix this! Then I will give it 5 stars.
reviews.author: Quinn Grasteit

reviews.title: Error
reviews.comment: I paid a couple of dollars for nothing !!! Every time when loading a map said: java.lang error!!! How can I fix it???
reviews.author: Gergana Noneva

reviews.title: Alvin Unknown Error missing user ID
reviews.comment: I couldn\'t wait to buy this game on my new nexus 7! I own the Steam,iOS and Boxed game. But every time I go to Online Games I get Alvin Error Missing User ID. I\'ve tried uninstalling and reinstalling with no luck. Once this issue gets fixed I will change my rating to 4 stars.
reviews.author: Brandon Boyd

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: Pass and play mode would be really nice.  But it is nice to finally have android versions of the better board games finally available.  Also, the AI in this version plays faster on the  nexus 10 than it does on the Xbox version of the game.
reviews.author: Dan Kassiday

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Now bring Smallworld to Android and you can have all my money.
reviews.author: Dan Head

reviews.title: Good but needs improvement
reviews.comment: Issue #1: No local play like iPhone or iPad.  Issue #2: It won\'t save the high scores from game to game. The leader board resets.
reviews.author: Natalie Immings

reviews.title: Worth buying if you like board game strategy over clickfests
reviews.comment: Great strategy game based on the board game.  I hope Days of Wonder ports their other games over to android also.
reviews.author: Mark Thorpe

reviews.title: Needs pass and play
reviews.comment: Love this game, glad to finally have it on Android! Works fine on my Xoom and Nexus 4. Really needs pass and play, excited for future updates.
reviews.author: Bradley Janssen

reviews.title: Must Buy!
reviews.comment: Awesome Game!   If you enjoy playing Ticket to Ride, you will enjoy having a mobile version!  Great game!!!  :D
reviews.author: Justin Davito

reviews.title: Perfect!
reviews.comment: This is what a proper Android game is about. You want more quality games like this and envy the games on Apple? Well vote with your wallet and reward companies for quality and stop complaining if you have to pay a few bucks for a game you play for hours or more.
reviews.author: John Behnke

reviews.title: Where is pass and play?
reviews.comment: Game is great. On Apple version you can play pass and play style. Please add, no point in the game if you can only play by yourself or online.
reviews.author: Kyle Smith
